name: Weightless (Squiddle, Cyprien.R)
description:
PLAYED ON KEYBOARD ONLY.

Take control of a small astronaut whose ship malfunctioned. Automatic gravity settings are offline and you need to manipulate gravity yourself to progress through the ship and repair your ship's gravity module.

Controls :

Arrow keys : Shift gravity in the indicated direction.

Project made during the Global Gamejam 2020 with the theme : Repair.

Game/Level Designers :

- Thomas PASSELEGUE

- Cyprien RAVIDAT

Programmer :

- Cyprien RAVIDAT

Graphists : 

- Lucas AMBS

- Louise FAYT

Music : 

- Thomas PASSELEGUE

- Cyprien RAVIDAT

- Louise FAYT
